zoomchattr 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Function reference

The main functions

Ingest a single Zoom chat file, or all of them

get_zoom_names()
Get a vector of Zoom chat files
parse_zoom_chat()
Parse a Zoom Chat file
parse_all_zoom_chat()
Parse a series of Zoom chats

Support functions

Helper functions for the main tasks

check_all_chat_format()
Check the chat format of all given files
check_chat_format()
Check chat format of a single file
check_in_out()
Check if in and out folders exist
get_files_of_type()
Get vector of filepaths
get_fdates()
Get file dates
parse_all_v1_chat()
Parse a series of version 1 chat files
parse_all_v2_chat()
Parse a series of version 2 Zoom chat files
parse_v1_chat()
Parse a Version 1 chat file into a tibble
parse_v2_chat()
Parse a version 2 chat file
process_from_column()
Process from column
